<!-- 基本文本输入 -->
<input type="text" name="username" placeholder="请输入用户名" maxlength="20" required>

<!-- 带验证的文本输入 -->
<input type="text" pattern="[A-Za-z0-9]+" title="只能包含字母和数字">

<!-- 密码输入框 -->
<input type="password" name="password" placeholder="请输入密码" minlength="6" required>

<!-- 确认密码 -->
<input type="password" name="confirm-password" placeholder="确认密码">

<!-- 单选按钮组 -->
<input type="radio" id="male" name="gender" value="male" checked>
<label for="male">男</label>

<input type="radio" id="female" name="gender" value="female">
<label for="female">女</label>

<!-- 复选框 -->
<input type="checkbox" id="hobby1" name="hobbies" value="reading">
<label for="hobby1">阅读</label>

<input type="checkbox" id="hobby2" name="hobbies" value="music" checked>
<label for="hobby2">音乐</label>

<input type="checkbox" id="agree" name="agreement" required>
<label for="agree">我同意条款</label>

<!-- 数字输入 -->
<input type="number" name="age" min="1" max="120" step="1" value="25">

<!-- 小数输入 -->
<input type="number" name="price" min="0" step="0.01" placeholder="0.00">

<!-- 带单位的数字 -->
<input type="number" name="quantity" min="1" max="100" value="1">

<!-- 基本滑动条 -->
<input type="range" name="volume" min="0" max="100" value="50">

<!-- 带步长的滑动条 -->
<input type="range" name="brightness" min="0" max="255" step="5" value="128">

<!-- 显示当前值 -->
<input type="range" id="slider" oninput="document.getElementById('output').value = this.value">
<output id="output">50</output>

column1: 如何使用JavaScript处理HTML5 input事件？
column2:
// 监听input事件
document.getElementById('myInput').addEventListener('input', function(e) {
  console.log('输入值：', e.target.value);
});

// 表单验证
function validateForm() {
  const email = document.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
  const number = document.querySelector('input[type="number"]');
  
  // 检查HTML5内置验证
  if (!email.checkValidity()) {
    alert('请输入有效的邮箱地址');
    return false;
  }
  
  // 自定义验证
  if (number.value < 18) {
    alert('年龄必须大于18岁');
    return false;
  }
  
  return true;
}
